synopsis.text:
Mikuriya Chisato, watch out! A new quiz champion is on the horizon, and his name is Shiki Koshiyama. As a freshman at Bunzo High School, all Shiki wants is to keep his head down and lose himself in his books. But when his classmate, the fiercely competitive Mari Fukami, drags him into the world of fast-paced quiz competitions, everything changes. Shiki discovers that there's more to quizzing than just knowing the answers - it's all about hitting the buzzer at the right moment.

As Shiki joins the Quiz Club, he meets other like-minded students and senior members who share his newfound passion. Together, they hone their skills and develop strategies to outsmart their rivals, including the formidable Chisato. With each competition, Shiki experiences the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat, but he never gives up. He's determined to become the best quizzer he can be, even if it means stepping out of his comfort zone.

So, if you're ready to experience the adrenaline-fueled world of competitive quizzing, join Shiki and his friends as they chase after the ultimate prize: the title of Quiz Champion!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
